sentence: what are the largest cities in the states that border the largest state ?
sentence-with-vars: what are the largest cities in the states that border the largest state ?
sql: select city.city_name from state , city where state.state_name in ( select border_info.border from state , border_info where state.state_name in ( select state.state_name from state where state.area = ( select max ( state.area ) from state ) ) and state.state_name = border_info.state_name ) and state.state_name = city.state_name and city.population = ( select max ( city.population ) from state , city where state.state_name in ( select border_info.border from state , border_info where state.state_name in ( select state.state_name from state where state.area = ( select max ( state.area ) from state ) ) and state.state_name = border_info.state_name ) and state.state_name = city.state_name ) ;
sql-with-vars: select city.city_name from state , city where state.state_name in ( select border_info.border from state , border_info where state.state_name in ( select state.state_name from state where state.area = ( select max ( state.area ) from state ) ) and state.state_name = border_info.state_name ) and state.state_name = city.state_name and city.population = ( select max ( city.population ) from state , city where state.state_name in ( select border_info.border from state , border_info where state.state_name in ( select state.state_name from state where state.area = ( select max ( state.area ) from state ) ) and state.state_name = border_info.state_name ) and state.state_name = city.state_name ) ;
